01_list_all_files.name: List all files
01_list_all_files.description: List all files inside the current directory.
01_list_all_files.help: You might take a look at the command 'ls'.

02_get_current_directory.name: Get current directory
02_get_current_directory.help: You might take a look at the command 'pwd'

04_create_index_html.name: Create index.html .
04_create_index_html.description: Create a file named 'index.html' inside the 'html' folder.
04_create_index_html.help: Make sure that you place the file inside the html directory. You might take a look at the command touch.

05_delete_me.name: Delete the file 'DELETE.ME', but leave the rest.
05_delete_me.description: Delete the file 'DELETE.ME', but leave the rest.
05_delete_me.help: Look into folders and subfolders. Also make sure to only delete DELETE.me

06_last_10_lines.name: Echo the last 10 lines of the log file.
06_last_10_lines.description: Echo the last 10 lines of the log file. There is only a single log file. Logfiles end with *.log.
06_last_10_lines.help: Make sure only echo the LAST 10 lines of the file. Hint: you can use tail.

07_all_lines_error.name: Get all those errors
07_all_lines_error.description: Echo all lines that have the string '500' in them.

08_current_user.name: Get current user
08_current_user.description: Who are you? Echo your current username.

09_copy_file.name: Copy copy.me
09_copy_file.description: Copy and Paste: Find and copy the file named 'copy.me' into the folder './destination/'
09_copy_file.help: You might need toi look into a directory or subdirectories. Also it might be needed to create the destination folder.

10_copy_locations.name: Copy locations
10_copy_locations.description: Copy the locations archive from Kiel to NY. After that remove the file from Kiel. Finally unzip the file
10_copy_locations.help: Read carefully: After your command there should be two files inside the NY folder and zero files inside Kiel.

11_all_files_that_end_with_log.name: Get all log files.
11_all_files_that_end_with_log.description: Get all log files. Logfiles end with .log

12_find_all_env_files_with_secrets.name: Find those secrets.
12_find_all_env_files_with_secrets.description: Find all .env files and find the secret key.
12_find_all_env_files_with_secrets.help: Files might not show up when using ls without any parameters. Your result should like: SECRET_KEY=something .

13_replace.name: Replace .
13_replace.description: Replace every occurrence of the word 'unix' to linux and save it to 'linux.txt'.
13_replace.target_file_content:
linux is a great os. linux is opensource. linux is a free os.
You should learn about linux.
13_replace.help: There should be two files: unix.txt and linux.txt. Also you might take a look at sed.
